org.jmc
Class MTLFile

java.lang.Object
  org.jmc.MTLFile

public class MTLFile
extends java.lang.Object

Material file class. This class describes the file which contains a library of all materials in the model. It is saved into a .MTL file that is linked from within the .OBJ file.

Author:
danijel
